verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician לִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> [Tliv-nei-for the sons קֹ֬רַח <S%H7141><s%> Ko-rach of Korah מַשְׂכִּֽיל׃ <S%H4905><s%> mas-Kil. Maschil אֱלֹהִ֤ים׀ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him O God בְּאָזְנֵ֬ינוּ <S%H241><s%> be-'a-ze-Nei-nu with our ears שָׁמַ֗עְנוּ <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma'-nu, We have heard אֲבוֹתֵ֥ינוּ <S%H1><s%> a-vo-Tei-nu our fathers סִפְּרוּ־ <S%H5608><s%> sip-pe-ru- have told לָ֑נוּ La-nu; פֹּ֥עַל <S%H6467><s%> Po-'al us [what] work פָּעַ֥לְתָּ <S%H6466><s%> pa-'Al-ta thou didst בִֽ֝ימֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H3117><s%> vi-mei-Hem, in their days בִּ֣ימֵי <S%H3117><s%> Bi-mei in the times קֶֽדֶם׃ <S%H6924><s%> Ke-dem. of old

אַתָּ֤ה׀ <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah your own יָדְךָ֡ <S%H3027><s%> ya-de-Cha with thy hand גּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim the heathen ה֭וֹרַשְׁתָּ <S%H3423><s%> Ho-rash-ta [How] thou didst drive out וַתִּטָּעֵ֑ם <S%H5193><s%> vat-tit-ta-'Em; and plantedst תָּרַ֥ע <S%H7489><s%> ta-Ra' them [how] thou didst afflict לְ֝אֻמִּ֗ים <S%H3816><s%> le-'um-Mim, the people וַֽתְּשַׁלְּחֵֽם׃ <S%H7971><s%> Vat-te-shal-le-Chem. and cast them out

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לֹ֪א <S%H3808><s%> lo not בְחַרְבָּ֡ם <S%H2719><s%> ve-char-Bam by their own sword יָ֥רְשׁוּ <S%H3423><s%> Ya-re-shu in possession אָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz, not the land וּזְרוֹעָם֮ <S%H2220><s%> u-ze-ro-'Am neither did their own arm לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- did not הוֹשִׁ֪יעָ֫ה <S%H3467><s%> ho-Shi-'Ah save לָּ֥מוֹ la-mo כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- But יְמִֽינְךָ֣ <S%H3225><s%> ye-mi-ne-Cha them but thy right hand וּ֭זְרוֹעֲךָ <S%H2220><s%> U-ze-ro-'a-cha and thine arm וְא֥וֹר <S%H216><s%> ve-'or and the light פָּנֶ֗יךָ <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nei-cha, of thy countenance כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for רְצִיתָֽם׃ <S%H7521><s%> re-tzi-Tam. because thou hadst a favour

אַתָּה־ <S%H859><s%> 'at-tah- you ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu You מַלְכִּ֣י <S%H4428><s%> mal-Ki Thou art my King אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; O God צַ֝וֵּ֗ה <S%H6680><s%> tzav-Veh, command יְשׁוּע֥וֹת <S%H3444><s%> ye-shu-'ot deliverances יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko. for Jacob

בְּ֭ךָ Be-cha צָרֵ֣ינוּ <S%H6862><s%> tza-Rei-nu our enemies נְנַגֵּ֑חַ <S%H5055><s%> ne-nag-Ge-ach; Through thee will we push down בְּ֝שִׁמְךָ֗ <S%H8034><s%> be-shim-cha, through thy name נָב֥וּס <S%H947><s%> na-Vus will we tread them under קָמֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H6965><s%> ka-Mei-nu. that rise up

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo Nor בְקַשְׁתִּ֣י <S%H7198><s%> ve-kash-Ti in my bow אֶבְטָ֑ח <S%H982><s%> 'ev-Tach; For I will not trust וְ֝חַרְבִּ֗י <S%H2719><s%> ve-char-Bi, neither shall my sword לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo Nor תוֹשִׁיעֵֽנִי׃ <S%H3467><s%> to-shi-'E-ni. save

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for ה֭וֹשַׁעְתָּנוּ <S%H3467><s%> Hoo-sha'-ta-nu But thou hast saved מִצָּרֵ֑ינוּ <S%H6862><s%> mitz-tza-Rei-nu; us from our enemies וּמְשַׂנְאֵ֥ינוּ <S%H8130><s%> u-me-san-'Ei-nu that hated הֱבִישֽׁוֹתָ׃ <S%H954><s%> he-vi-Sho-ta. and hast put them to shame

בֵּֽ֭אלֹהִים <S%H430><s%> Be-lo-him In God הִלַּלְ֣נוּ <S%H1984><s%> hil-laL-nu we boast כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol all הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom; all the day וְשִׁמְךָ֓׀ <S%H8034><s%> ve-shim-Cha thy name לְעוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam for ever נוֹדֶ֣ה <S%H3034><s%> no-Deh long and praise סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

אַף־ <S%H637><s%> 'af- But זָ֭נַחְתָּ <S%H2186><s%> Za-nach-ta thou hast cast off וַתַּכְלִימֵ֑נוּ <S%H3637><s%> vat-tach-li-Me-nu; and put us to shame וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- not תֵ֝צֵ֗א <S%H3318><s%> te-Tze, and goest not forth בְּצִבְאוֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H6635><s%> be-tziv-'o-Tei-nu. with our armies

תְּשִׁיבֵ֣נוּ <S%H7725><s%> te-shi-Ve-nu Thou makest us to turn אָ֭חוֹר <S%H268><s%> 'A-chor back מִנִּי־ <S%H4480><s%> min-ni- from צָ֑ר <S%H6862><s%> Tzar; from the enemy וּ֝מְשַׂנְאֵ֗ינוּ <S%H8130><s%> u-me-san-'Ei-nu, and they which hate שָׁ֣סוּ <S%H8154><s%> Sha-su us spoil לָֽמוֹ׃ la-mo.

תִּ֭תְּנֵנוּ <S%H5414><s%> Tit-te-ne-nu Thou hast given כְּצֹ֣אן <S%H6629><s%> ke-Tzon us like sheep מַאֲכָ֑ל <S%H3978><s%> ma-'a-Chal; [appointed] for meat וּ֝בַגּוֹיִ֗ם <S%H1471><s%> u-vag-go-Yim, us among the heathen זֵרִיתָֽנוּ׃ <S%H2219><s%> ze-ri-Ta-nu. and hast scattered

תִּמְכֹּֽר־ <S%H4376><s%> tim-kor- Thou sellest עַמְּךָ֥ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-me-Cha thy people בְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- for ה֑וֹן <S%H1952><s%> Hon; for nought וְלֹ֥א־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo- not רִ֝בִּ֗יתָ <S%H7235><s%> rib-Bi-ta, and dost not increase בִּמְחִירֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H4242><s%> bim-chi-rei-Hem. [thy wealth] by their price

תְּשִׂימֵ֣נוּ <S%H7760><s%> te-si-Me-nu Thou makest חֶ֭רְפָּה <S%H2781><s%> Cher-pah us a reproach לִשְׁכֵנֵ֑ינוּ <S%H7934><s%> lish-che-Nei-nu; to our neighbours לַ֥עַג <S%H3933><s%> La-'ag a scorn וָ֝קֶ֗לֶס <S%H7047><s%> va-Ke-les, and a derision לִסְבִיבוֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H5439><s%> lis-vi-vo-Tei-nu. to them that are round about

תְּשִׂימֵ֣נוּ <S%H7760><s%> te-si-Me-nu Thou makest מָ֭שָׁל <S%H4912><s%> Ma-shol us a byword בַּגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> bag-go-Yim; among the heathen מְנֽוֹד־ <S%H4493><s%> me-nod- a shaking רֹ֝֗אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> Rosh, of the head בַּל־ <S%H3816><s%> bal- among the people אֻמִּֽים׃ <S%H3816><s%> 'um-Mim. the peoples

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All הַ֭יּוֹם <S%H3117><s%> Hai-yom [is] continually כְּלִמָּתִ֣י <S%H3639><s%> ke-lim-ma-Ti My confusion נֶגְדִּ֑י <S%H5048><s%> neg-Di; is before וּבֹ֖שֶׁת <S%H1322><s%> u-Vo-shet before me and the shame פָּנַ֣י <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nai of my face כִּסָּֽתְנִי׃ <S%H3680><s%> kis-Sa-te-ni. hath covered

מִ֭קּוֹל <S%H6963><s%> Mik-kol For the voice מְחָרֵ֣ף <S%H2778><s%> me-cha-Ref of him that reproacheth וּמְגַדֵּ֑ף <S%H1442><s%> u-me-gad-Def; and blasphemeth מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei by reason א֝וֹיֵ֗ב <S%H341><s%> o-Yev, of the enemy וּמִתְנַקֵּֽם׃ <S%H5358><s%> u-mit-nak-Kem. and avenger

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All זֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> zot likewise בָּ֭אַתְנוּ <S%H935><s%> Ba-'at-nu All this is come וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo have not שְׁכַחֲנ֑וּךָ <S%H7911><s%> she-cha-cha-Nu-cha; upon us yet have we not forgotten וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo-Shi- have not שִׁ֝קַּ֗רְנוּ <S%H8266><s%> Kar-nu, thee neither have we dealt falsely בִּבְרִיתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1285><s%> biv-ri-Te-cha. in thy covenant

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- has not נָס֣וֹג <S%H5472><s%> na-Sog is not turned אָח֣וֹר <S%H268><s%> a-Chor back לִבֵּ֑נוּ <S%H3820><s%> lib-Be-nu; Our heart וַתֵּ֥ט <S%H5186><s%> vat-Tet declined אֲשֻׁרֵ֗ינוּ <S%H838><s%> 'a-shu-Rei-nu, neither have our steps מִנִּ֥י <S%H4480><s%> min-Ni from אָרְחֶֽךָ׃ <S%H734><s%> 'a-re-Che-cha. from thy way

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki Yet דִ֭כִּיתָנוּ <S%H1794><s%> Dik-ki-ta-nu Though thou hast sore broken בִּמְק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> bim-Kom us in the place תַּנִּ֑ים <S%H8577><s%> tan-Nim; of dragons וַתְּכַ֖ס <S%H3680><s%> vat-te-Chas and covered עָלֵ֣ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu with בְצַלְמָֽוֶת׃ <S%H6757><s%> ve-tzal-Ma-vet. us with the shadow of death

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'i-mo-Sha- If שָׁ֭כַחְנוּ <S%H7911><s%> chach-nu If we have forgotten שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> shem the name אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu; of our God וַנִּפְרֹ֥שׂ <S%H6566><s%> van-nif-Ros or stretched out כַּ֝פֵּ֗ינוּ <S%H3709><s%> kap-Pei-nu, our hands לְאֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> le-'El god זָֽר׃ <S%H2114><s%> Zar. to a strange

הֲלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo not אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him Shall not God יַֽחֲקָר־ <S%H2713><s%> ya-cha-kor- search this out זֹ֑את <S%H2063><s%> Zot; likewise כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu He יֹ֝דֵ֗עַ <S%H3045><s%> yo-De-a', ;for he knoweth תַּעֲלֻמ֥וֹת <S%H8587><s%> ta-'a-lu-Mot the secrets לֵֽב׃ <S%H3820><s%> Lev. of the heart

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for עָ֭לֶיךָ <S%H5921><s%> 'A-lei-cha your sake הֹרַ֣גְנוּ <S%H2026><s%> ho-Rag-nu Yea for thy sake are we killed כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol all הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom; all the day נֶ֝חְשַׁ֗בְנוּ <S%H2803><s%> nech-Shav-nu, long we are counted כְּצֹ֣אן <S%H6629><s%> ke-Tzon as sheep טִבְחָֽה׃ <S%H2878><s%> tiv-Chah. for the slaughter

ע֤וּרָה׀ <S%H5782><s%> 'U-rah Awake לָ֖מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Lam-mah why תִישַׁ֥ן׀ <S%H3462><s%> ti-Shan why sleepest אֲדֹנָ֑י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai; the Lord הָ֝קִ֗יצָה <S%H6974><s%> ha-Ki-tzah, arise אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּזְנַ֥ח <S%H2186><s%> tiz-Nach cast [us] not off לָנֶֽצַח׃ <S%H5331><s%> la-Ne-tzach. for ever

לָֽמָּה־ <S%H4100><s%> lam-mah- Why פָנֶ֥יךָ <S%H6440><s%> fa-Nei-cha thou thy face תַסְתִּ֑יר <S%H5641><s%> tas-Tir; Wherefore hidest תִּשְׁכַּ֖ח <S%H7911><s%> tish-Kach [and] forgettest עָנְיֵ֣נוּ <S%H6040><s%> 'a-ne-Ye-nu our affliction וְֽלַחֲצֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H3906><s%> Ve-la-cha-Tze-nu. affliction

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for שָׁ֣חָה <S%H7743><s%> Sha-chah is bowed down לֶעָפָ֣ר <S%H6083><s%> le-'a-Far to the dust נַפְשֵׁ֑נוּ <S%H5315><s%> naf-She-nu; For our soul דָּבְקָ֖ה <S%H1692><s%> da-ve-Kah cleaveth לָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> la-'A-retz unto the earth בִּטְנֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H990><s%> bit-Ne-nu. our belly

ק֭וּמָֽה <S%H6965><s%> Ku-mah Arise עֶזְרָ֣תָה <S%H5833><s%> 'ez-Ra-tah for our help לָּ֑נוּ La-nu; וּ֝פְדֵ֗נוּ <S%H6299><s%> u-fe-De-nu, and redeem לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an the sake חַסְדֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H2617><s%> chas-De-cha. us for thy mercies'
